Pre-Game Insights: The USA-India T20I clash has raised excitement and expectations among fans, after both teams returned 100%-win records in their first two group games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Promotional priced tickets are available for the USA-India ICC T20 World Cup clash at $350 per ticket.
Others: The match begins at 10.30am Eastern Standard Time and is scheduled to take place on June 12, 2024, at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium.
